jaina:Aluneth.NAME: Aluneth
jaina:Aluneth.FLAVOR: PHENOMENAL ARCANE POWER...itty bitty living space.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b3 additional cards. Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, take #b5 damage.

jaina:ArcaniteCrystal.NAME: Arcanite Crystal
jaina:ArcaniteCrystal.FLAVOR: An exceptionally rare natural crystal containing arcane power.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play an #yArcane card each turn, a random card in your hand costs #b0 that turn.

jaina:ArchmageStaff.NAME: Archmage's Bygone Staff
jaina:ArchmageStaff.FLAVOR: Nearly naught remains of the power once contained in this archmage's staff.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b1 random Common card into your hand.

jaina:AscendantScroll.NAME: Ascendant Scroll
jaina:AscendantScroll.FLAVOR: A scroll written in an ancient language, the use of which can have unpredictable consequences.
DESCRIPTIONS: During your turn, #yright #yclick: Spend [E] [E] . Add #b1 random spell card into your hand. It costs #b2 less this turn.

jaina:BookOfWonders.NAME: Book of Wonders
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, shuffle #b5 #yScrolls #yof #yWonder into your draw pile.

jaina:RobesOfGaudiness.NAME: Robes of Gaudiness
jaina:RobesOfGaudiness.FLAVOR: Countless magical gems are embedded into this robe - yet few who have worn it can harness their power.
DESCRIPTIONS: All your spell cards cost 0. You may not play more than #b3 cards each turn.

jaina:RubySpellstone.NAME: Ruby Spellstone
jaina:RubySpellstone.FLAVOR: The final stone undid its master. Spun into wards by nameless caster. Azari wailed a savage roar. Now sealed in nether, evermore.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever your play #b3 spell cards of the same kind in a row, gain [E] .

jaina:SphereOfSapience.NAME: Sphere of Sapience
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, during your turn, #yright #yclick: #yScry #b5, then draw #b1 card.

jaina:TheCoin.NAME: The Coin
jaina:TheCoin.FLAVOR: It may not bring good luck, but it can certainly give you a hand!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b1 #yThe #yCoin into your hand.
